name: Tanuki's Dream
description:
Tanuki's Dream is a 2D top-down, arena-like dungeon crawler. Defeat enemies to appropiate their abilities and use them to your advantage! Fight your way through the kappa-infested swamp and find the hidden Tanuki village.

Meet the Team:

Matheo Steinbach - Team Lead, Programmer, Game Designer, Producer

Araya Muangkhunrong - 2D Lead Artist

Cecilia Breithaupt - 2D Artist, UI Artist

Iris Kanevskii - 2D Artist, Animator

Lukas Ries - 2D Artist, VFX Artist
